## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem or limitation you're facing.

Example: "I need to process files in X format, but currently only Y is supported..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like to see.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Use Case

Explain how this feature would be used and who would benefit from it.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, examples, or screenshots about the feature request.
